description.ko: 복잡한 프랙탈 유리 기하학 안에 담긴 빛의 굴절과 순수 에너지에 대한 연구입니다.
description.en: A study of light refraction and pure energy contained within complex fractal glass geometry.

prompt: A hyper-complex glass nautilus shell being pierced by a concentrated beam of white light, exploding into a web of #FF0080, #00FF80, and #8000FF spectral shards. Intense light dispersion, refractive indices, and chromatic aberration at every crystal facet. 8k, hyper-realistic, raytracing. Sharp macro focus on the points where light splits into pure energy. Detailed rainbow caustics dance across a dark void, capturing the prismatic energy and the #FFFF00 saturated atmosphere.
